tasks: I contributed to designing and developing new web platforms and maintained existing ones in a Full-Stack Web Developer role.
I utilized Next.js, Svelte, Node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, Oracle, and Docker to deliver robust, efficient solutions.
I collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to translate business requirements into user-friendly, scalable features, optimizing performance and overall user experience.

Designed and built an end-to-end QR code-based access control platform. Used Svelte for the interface, Angular for the core application, Node.js for the backend, and PostgreSQL for the database—from concept to successful deployment.
Adopted Agile methodologies, implementing security measures and backup strategies to ensure data integrity and availability.
Developed web modules (frontend and backend) using jQuery, JavaScript, PHP, and Oracle.
Skilled in designing and implementing registration pages and forms, delivering robust and user-friendly solutions.
Maintained and created registration forms for electoral campaigns.

PROJECTS.title: Ezsecure
PROJECTS.description: Ezsecure is a platform that provides comprehensive solutions for access control and security in condominiums. It simplifies management, enhances security, and provides an exceptional experience for residents and visitors.

PROJECTS.title: KindHealth
PROJECTS.description: KindHealth is a platform that provides a personalized insurance strategy for individuals and families to help protect them against financial risks.

PROJECTS.title: Eleckto
PROJECTS.description: Built tools and strategies to streamline campaign workflows, achieving electoral success by leveraging cutting-edge technology and earning client trust.

PROJECTS.title: Cormati
PROJECTS.description: Creates virtual agents that replicate top salespeople to serve more customers simultaneously and amplify sales results.
